timeline.head: Ropsten Alpha
body: The Jibrel Network Limited Alpha goes live on Ropsten

timeline.head: Jibrel Network Token (JNT) Pre-sale
body: Jibrel Network Token offered at a discounted price

timeline.head: jWallet Release
body: The official CryDR wallet is released under an open-source license for community use

timeline.head: jCash Launch / Public Sale
body: Jibrel Network launches an additional five fiat currencies at the jCash launch

timeline.head: CryDR Explorer
body: A dedicated CryDR block explorer is released to facilitate closer / more detailed tracking of CryDRs on the network

timeline.head: Institutional Grade Banking Platform
body: An institutional-grade solution for banks and other financial institutions to directly tokenize and transact with their own off-chain assets

timeline.head: Jibrel DAO / Full Decentralization
body: Jibrel DAO is launched and the network begins full decentralization (Project Pinocchio)
